name: Greentech Capital Advisors
overview: Greentech Capital Advisors is a specialist investment banking firm serving companies transforming the world’s energy, industrial, and resource infrastructure. The firm provides financial advisory services – such as M&A, exclusive sale transactions, restructurings, private placements and project finance – to the global corporations and emerging growth companies that are driving the transition to a clean growth economy. Through its offices in New York, Zurich and San Francisco, the firm’s professionals maintain an extensive global network of direct relationships. With more expertise and more deal experience in the clean technology space, Greentech Capital Advisors offers clients tailored solutions designed to meet their needs.
